const pageSize=6;const totalCards=products.length;const totalPages=Math.ceil(totalCards/pageSize);const validPage=Math.min(Math.max(1,currentPage),totalPages);const startIndex=(validPage-1)*pageSize;const endIndex=startIndex+pageSize;const currentProducts=products.slice(startIndex,endIndex);const handleSearchChange=e=>{setSearchValue(e.target.value);};const monthNames=["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"];return monthNames[index];};export default ProductList;
